CHAT.comment: GLOBAL-TECH APPLIANCES, INC., ET AL., Petitioners v. SEB S.A.
The above-entitled matter came on for oral argument before the Supreme Court of the United States at 11:13 a.m.
ORAL ARGUMENT OF WILLIAM DUNNEGAN ON BEHALF OF PETITIONERS
ORAL ARGUMENT OF R. TED CRUZ ON BEHALF OF RESPONDENT
REBUTTAL ARGUMENT OF WILLIAM DUNNEGAN ON BEHALF OF PETITIONERS
(Whereupon, at 12: 14 p.m., the case in the above-entitled matter was submitted.)
